LanguageData.DankPyon_NoMilksFound: No milks found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SelectMilk: Select a type of milk to be pressed
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionMilkDesc: Bring milk to the cheese press to start pressing
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveMilkDesc: Remove the milk from the press. This can only be done before you start pressing it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingMilkDesc: Cancel bringing milk to the cheese press.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndMilk: Wait until the milk has been brought to the cheese press, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageMilkDesc: Start pressing milk. This process takes 5 days and can't be interrupted, or the milk will be destroyed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CheeseFinished: A cheese has finished ripening in the cheese press
LanguageData.DankPyon_CheeseInProgress: A {0} is pressing. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_CheeseReady: A cheese has finished pressing and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_MilkImproperlyDefined: This milk has been improperly defined to work with the cheese press, contact the milk mod's author
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveCheeseDesc: Remove cheese from the cheese press.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CheesePressEmpty: Cheese press is empty right now
LanguageData.DankPyon_NoMeatsFound: No meats found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SelectMeat: Select a type of meat to be smoked
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionMeatDesc: Bring meat to the smoker to start smoking
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveMeatDesc: Remove the meat from the smoker. This can only be done before you start smoking it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingMeatDesc: Cancel bringing meat to the smoker.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndMeat: Wait until the meat has been brought to the smoker, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageMeatDesc: Start smoking meat. This process takes a day and can't be interrupted, or the meat will be destroyed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SmokedMeatFinished: Smoked meats have finished cooking in the smoker
LanguageData.DankPyon_SmokedMeatInProgress: A {0} is being smoked. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_SmokedMeatReady: meats have finished smoking and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_MeatImproperlyDefined: This meat has been improperly defined to work with the smoker, contact the meat mod's author
LanguageData.DankPyon_NoMeatsFound: No meats found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SelectMeat: Select a type of meat to be dried
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionMeatDesc: Bring meat to the drying rack to start drying
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveMeatDesc: Remove the meat from the drying rack. This can only be done before you start drying it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingMeatDesc: Cancel bringing meat to the drying rack.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndMeat: Wait until the meat has been brought to the drying rack, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageMeatDesc: Start drying meat. This process takes a day and can't be interrupted, or the meat will be destroyed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_DriedMeatFinished: Dried meats have finished drying in the drying rack
LanguageData.DankPyon_DriedMeatInProgress: A {0} is being dried. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_DriedMeatReady: meats have finished drying and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_MeatImproperlyDefined: This meat has been improperly defined to work with the drying rack, contact the meat mod's author
LanguageData.DankPyon_DryingRackEmpty: Drying rack is empty right now
LanguageData.DankPyon_NoHayFound: No hay found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionHayDesc: Bring hay to the rack to start drying
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveHayDesc: Remove the hay from the drying rack. This can only be done before you start drying it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingHayDesc: Cancel bringing hay to the drying rack.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndHay: Wait until the hay has been brought to the drying rack, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageHayDesc: Start drying hay. This process take 3 days.
LanguageData.DankPyon_StrawFinished: Straw have finished drying in the drying rack
LanguageData.DankPyon_StrawInProgress: A {0} is being dried. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_StrawReady: hay have finished drying and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_MeatImproperlyDefined: This hay has been improperly defined to work with the drying rack, contact the hay mod's author
LanguageData.DankPyon_DryingRackEmpty: Drying rack is empty right now
